programme.title: Good To Know
programme.desc: Discover inspirational news, with real-life stories of everyday people who positively impact their communities.

programme.title: Good To Know
programme.desc: Discover inspirational news, with real-life stories of everyday people who positively impact their communities.

programme.title: Independent America
programme.desc: Independent voters discuss a range of issues, including inflation, immigration, and abortion. In this special 1-hour documentary, correspondent Gianna Toboni spends time with voters in their daily lives to see how the major issues are impacting them on a personal level.

programme.title: Rhode Island Ripper
programme.desc: Women in a working-class Rhode Island town begin mysteriously disappearing. Cops investigate and discover the dark obsession of a serial killer nobody suspected.

programme.title: Cleveland Killer
programme.desc: A damaged man turns Cleveland, Ohio into a hunting ground as part of a twisted plot to exact revenge on the women who hurt him. After 10 months of terror, can cops bring him to justice?

programme.title: New Orleans Massacre
programme.desc: A merciless triple homicide in New Orleans, Louisiana leaves law enforcement with puzzling clues. But as they piece together the mystery, they quickly realize there is more to the murders than a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: The Missing Pendant
programme.desc: The grisly murder of a grandmother in the suburbs of Cincinnati, Ohio sends a small-town police department into a fast and furious hunt for a killer. It takes nearly a year, a microscopic clue, and a piece of jewelry as unique as a fingerprint for law enforcement to bring the murderer to justice.

programme.title: The Informant
programme.desc: In Southern California, law enforcement hunt for a serial killer who is targeting elderly women within a few mile radius. After weeks of searching, a survivor comes forward with a description that blows the case wide open.

programme.title: Bayou Strangler
programme.desc: A serial predator terrorizes Southeastern Louisiana, strangling men to death and disposing of their bodies like trash. This deranged killer gets away with murder for nearly a decade until a potential victim escapes his clutches and then leads police right to the killer's doorstep.

programme.title: Cold Storage Killer
programme.desc: Police follow the trail of a young Southern California woman who vanishes without a trace. Authorities work the missing person investigation for years until a random encounter turns them onto a chilling discovery and an even colder criminal.

programme.title: Nameless in New Jersey
programme.desc: The discovery of a Jane Doe underneath a New Jersey bridge kick starts an intensive investigation to figure out who she is and how she died. Law enforcement uses a combination of forensic evidence and eyewitnesses to solve the mystery and bring a murderer to justice.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: Eli wants to step out from behind his camera lens and focus on finding a true match. Which of his dates will snap up his attention?

programme.title: Ballin' in Baltimore
programme.desc: Angel gears up for a day of nonstop action with adrenaline-junkie and restaurateur, Steve Chu. They get their hearts pumping with crazy-fast jet skis, hardcore jiu jitsu training, a sky-high ropes course and an epic paintball showdown.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: Years ago Chef Bergen Carmen from Meril and Chef Aaron Villeda from Bao Mi worked side-by-side; now theyre back getting their hands dirty for some friendly competition. Will his old pal chicken liver turn out to be Chef Villedas ultimate downfall?

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: They take to the skies and seas, hit the open road, or attempt to reunite with a loved one. This episode of Stitch inspires the adventurous spirit through those who have bravely charted their own paths.

programme.title: Show Me Milwaukee
programme.desc: Whats the best way to experience Milwaukee? By boat! Greg gets a kayaking tour from the founder of Support Local MKE, Marleigh Petras, who shows him all the best spots to hit along the Menomonee River.

programme.desc: Episodes of "Hometown Tragedy" and "Crimes, Cons, and Capers"

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: Seasonal ingredients are the stars of any dish, and Chef Chris Barnum-Dann and Chef Brett Bohlmann prove it in this fully vegetarian episode. Will the judges fawn over their flavors, or will they miss the meat?

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Dare to investigate a haunted psychiatric museum. See where Jesse James met his untimely demise. If staying the night in a mansion is your desire, then to thine own self be true - check in to the Shakespeare Chteau on Millionaire's Row.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.desc: Our KC experts include a Savage X Fenty model who also walks his own line, an MTV star who's turning carnivores on to the #plantlife and a local blogger with the scoop on where to let your dog off-leash while enjoying an adult beverage.

programme.title: Stitch

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Sometimes, would-be criminals are their own worst enemies. This episode highlights crime fails, and the officers - and ordinary civilians - who save the day.

programme.title: Show Me Milwaukee
programme.desc: Filipino food entrepreneur, Alexa Alfaro shows Greg around Milwaukee as they gather people for a special Kamayan dinner. Greg learns family cooking secrets, explores the Sherman Phoenix, becomes a train conductor and learns to drive a food truck.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Maverick Meyers is a shy 17 year old gamer who spends 8 hours a day on his self-built computer. Kinga meets Maverick in Clermont, Florida to take him out of his comfort zone on an outing hell never forget.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: In this battle, it's sink or swim. Chef Josiah of Purple Ocean Superfood Bar in Waterford Lakes takes on Chef Daniel of The Moderne in the Mills 50 district. Weve got a seafood extravaganza on this episode of Blind Kitchen.

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.desc: Local comedy duos debate the best po' boys in the city, get fit and flexible, discover vintage threads and more on two cheap "dates" in New Orleans.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: Growing up, two siblings hear unsettling stories about their family's history. They don't know what to believe about the ones who went missing in 1992, until, decades later, the haunting truth comes out.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Stay the course in the Driftless Region of Wisconsin when you explore the Troll Capital of the World. Join a mug club, satisfy your sweet tooth, and journey back in time as you fall asleep in a restored inn.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.desc: Ed and Day volunteer at the Pittsburgh Zoo and Aquarium. The guys go behind the scenes and get up close and personal with red pandas, giraffes, and sea lions.

programme.desc: Independent voters discuss a range of issues, including inflation, immigration, and abortion. In this special 1-hour documentary, correspondent Gianna Toboni spends time with voters in their daily lives to see how the major issues are impacting them on a personal level.

programme.title: Rhode Island Ripper
programme.desc: Women in a working-class Rhode Island town begin mysteriously disappearing. Cops investigate and discover the dark obsession of a serial killer nobody suspected.

programme.title: Cleveland Killer
programme.desc: A damaged man turns Cleveland, Ohio into a hunting ground as part of a twisted plot to exact revenge on the women who hurt him. After 10 months of terror, can cops bring him to justice?

programme.title: New Orleans Massacre
programme.desc: A merciless triple homicide in New Orleans, Louisiana leaves law enforcement with puzzling clues. But as they piece together the mystery, they quickly realize there is more to the murders than a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: The Missing Pendant
programme.desc: The grisly murder of a grandmother in the suburbs of Cincinnati, Ohio sends a small-town police department into a fast and furious hunt for a killer. It takes nearly a year, a microscopic clue, and a piece of jewelry as unique as a fingerprint for law enforcement to bring the murderer to justice.

programme.title: The Informant
programme.desc: In Southern California, law enforcement hunt for a serial killer who is targeting elderly women within a few mile radius. After weeks of searching, a survivor comes forward with a description that blows the case wide open.

programme.title: Bayou Strangler
programme.desc: A serial predator terrorizes Southeastern Louisiana, strangling men to death and disposing of their bodies like trash. This deranged killer gets away with murder for nearly a decade until a potential victim escapes his clutches and then leads police right to the killer's doorstep.

programme.desc: The mystery of a soccer mom moonlighting as an escort who disappears from Western Colorado. It takes homicide detectives nearly seven years to unravel what proves to be a cold-blooded murder and a horrific cover up perpetrated by a suspect they'd identified from the outset.

programme.desc: A recent widower is brutally murdered inside his North Dakota home. Law enforcement quickly uncover evidence that reveals the homicide is part of a desperate plan from a person almost too close for suspicion.

programme.title: Polo King's Deadly Hit And Run
programme.desc: Florida polo enthusiast and billionaire, John Goodman, blows through a stop sign and slams into another car killing a college student. And a celebrity publicist backs her SUV into a crowd outside a nightclub, then flees the scene.

programme.title: From Student Seduction To Murder
programme.desc: High school staffer, Pamela Smart, becomes a household name when she starts a love affair with a student, who she convinces to kill her husband. This tale of illicit sex and murder for insurance money become a real-life American soap opera.

programme.title: North Hollywood Gun Battle
programme.desc: Los Angeles police respond to a bank heist and find they are outgunned by the robbers. Citizens and police run for cover in a brazen deadly shootout.

programme.title: Dark Family Secrets Turn Deadly

programme.title: Deserts
programme.desc: Host Philippe Cousteau visits the Mohave Desert, and discovers how varied deserts can be; some deserts are covered with sand dunes, while others have amazing vegetation. We also travel to Death Valley, the hottest spot in North America. Then we explore the Joshua Tree National Park, which has the unusual Joshua tree, and many other exotic plants.

programme.title: Canyons
programme.desc: Host Philippe Cousteau travels to the Grand Canyon by helicopter, and gives us a close look at this amazing canyon, which is considered one of the seven natural wonders of the world. We'll also visit Bryce Canyon and its fascinating "hoodoos," which are rock formations sculpted by weather. We'll also dive into the Monterrey Bay and discover an incredible underwater canyon that features some unusual sea creatures.

programme.title: Primarily Primates
programme.desc: In this episode we meet human's closest relatives - primates. See what makes a chimpanzee one of the most intelligent primates. Find out why the spider monkey is such an amazing climber and feel the power of the howler monkey's howl.

programme.title: Surf and Turf
programme.desc: In this episode we'll find out how sharks use electro-sensors to detect their prey. Also, discover the skunk's stinky defense mechanism. And domestic versus wild - see how the striped zebra matches up against its cousin the horse.

programme.title: Big Sur
programme.desc: Jefferson Graham takes us on a photowalk through Big Sur

programme.title: Oregon Coast
programme.desc: Jefferson Graham takes us on a photowalk through Oregon Coast

programme.title: Afghanistan Withdrawal
programme.desc: Scripps News explores the lives impacted by the U.S. troop withdrawal from Afghanistan in 2021. Critics say the government's decision lacked foresight, ultimately forcing the U.S. to take on tens of thousands of refugees. More than two years later, those refugees are still struggling to get back on their feet.

programme.title: Hurricane Michael
programme.desc: A look at how rebuilding efforts are going for Florida families that lost everything in the category 5 Hurricane Michael that made landfall in the FL panhandle on October 7, 2018. The episode goes into the complicated insurance process and how disasters price out people that used to live there. Several FL stations' coverage and talent featured in the episode.

programme.title: Afghanistan Withdrawal
programme.desc: Scripps News explores the lives impacted by the U.S. troop withdrawal from Afghanistan in 2021. Critics say the government's decision lacked foresight, ultimately forcing the U.S. to take on tens of thousands of refugees. More than two years later, those refugees are still struggling to get back on their feet.

programme.title: Hurricane Michael
programme.desc: A look at how rebuilding efforts are going for Florida families that lost everything in the category 5 Hurricane Michael that made landfall in the FL panhandle on October 7, 2018. The episode goes into the complicated insurance process and how disasters price out people that used to live there. Several FL stations' coverage and talent featured in the episode.

programme.title: New Orleans Massacre

programme.title: The Missing Pendant
programme.desc: The grisly murder of a grandmother in the suburbs of Cincinnati, Ohio sends a small-town police department into a fast and furious hunt for a killer. It takes nearly a year, a microscopic clue, and a piece of jewelry as unique as a fingerprint for law enforcement to bring the murderer to justice.

programme.title: The Informant
programme.desc: In Southern California, law enforcement hunt for a serial killer who is targeting elderly women within a few mile radius. After weeks of searching, a survivor comes forward with a description that blows the case wide open.

programme.title: Bayou Strangler
programme.desc: A serial predator terrorizes Southeastern Louisiana, strangling men to death and disposing of their bodies like trash. This deranged killer gets away with murder for nearly a decade until a potential victim escapes his clutches and then leads police right to the killer's doorstep.
